title: EV Charging Billing Dispute
description: A customer claims they were overcharged for a public EV charging session.

tasks.description: Retrieve the charging session details using the customer's account ID and the date of the session.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the session record showing start time, end time, and kWh delivered.

tasks.description: Verify the pricing rate applied during the session against the published rates for that charger and time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the correct time-of-use rate was applied.

tasks.description: Explain the charges to the customer, breaking down the cost based on energy consumed and any session fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the calculation of the final bill.
